analyzed: kathāvatthu
mahāpaṇṇāsaka
pannarasama vagga
tatiya saññā vedayita kathā
saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannaḥ kālam kareyya ati
āmantā

original: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṁ cittanti?
analyzed: atthi saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannassa māraṇantiyaḥ phassaḥ māraṇantiyā vedanā māraṇantiyā saññā māraṇantiyā cetanā māraṇantiyam cittan ti
na ha ivam vattabbe pe

original: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṁ cittanti?
analyzed: natthi saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannassa māraṇantiyaḥ phassaḥ māraṇantiyā vedanā māraṇantiyā saññā māraṇantiyā cetanā māraṇantiyam cittan ti
āmantā

original: Hañci natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṁ cittaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci natthi saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannassa māraṇantiyaḥ phassaḥ māraṇantiyā vedanā māraṇantiyā saññā māraṇantiyā cetanā māraṇantiyam citta no ca vata re vattabbe
saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannaḥ kālam kareyya ati

āmantā

original: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
analyzed: atthi saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannassa phassaḥ vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti
na ha ivam vattabbe pe

original: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
analyzed: natthi saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannassa phassaḥ vedanā saññā cetanā cittam
āmantā

original: Aphassakassa kālaṅkiriyā, avedanakassa kālaṅkiriyā …pe… acittakassa kālaṅkiriyāti?
analyzed: a phassakassa kālaṅkiriyā a vedanakassa kālaṅkiriyā pe acittakassa kālaṅkiriyā ati
na ha ivam vattabbe pe
nanu sa phassakassa kālaṅkiriyā pe sa cittakassa kālaṅkiriyā ti
āmantā

original: Hañci saphassakassa kālaṅkiriyā …pe… sacittakassa kālaṅkiriyā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sa phassakassa kālaṅkiriyā pe sa cittakassa kālaṅkiriyā no ca vata re vattabbe
saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannaḥ kālam kareyya ati
saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannaḥ kālam kareyya ati
āmantā

original: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa kāye visaṁ kameyya, satthaṁ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
analyzed: saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannassa kāye visam kameyya sattham kameyya aggi kameyya ati
na ha ivam vattabbe pe

original: saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa kāye visaṁ na kameyya, satthaṁ na kameyya, aggi na kameyyāti?
analyzed: saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannassa kāye visam na kameyya sattham na kameyya aggi na kameyya ati
āmantā

original: Hañci saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa kāye visaṁ na kameyya, satthaṁ na kameyya, aggi na kameyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannassa kāye visam na kameyya sattham na kameyya aggi na kameyya no ca vata re vattabbe
saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannaḥ kālam kareyya ati
saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannaḥ kālam kareyya ati
āmantā

original: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa kāye visaṁ kameyya, satthaṁ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
analyzed: saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannassa kāye visam kameyya sattham kameyya aggi kameyya ati

na nirodham samāpannoti
na ha ivam vattabbe pe
saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannaḥ na kālam kareyya ati
āmantā

original: Atthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpanno na kālaṁ kareyyāti?
analyzed: atthi so niyāmaḥ yena niyāmena niyataḥ saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannaḥ na kālam kareyya ati
natthi

original: Hañci natthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpanno na kālaṁ kareyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci natthi so niyāmaḥ yena niyāmena niyataḥ saññā vedayita nirodham samāpanno na kālam kareyya no ca vata re vattabbe

āmantā

original: Atthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī na kālaṁ kareyyāti?
analyzed: atthi so niyāmaḥ yena niyāmena niyataḥ cakkhu viññāṇa samaṅgī na kālam kareyya ati
natthi

original: Hañci natthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī na kālaṁ kareyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci natthi so niyāmaḥ yena niyāmena niyataḥ cakkhu viññāṇa samaṅgī na kālam kareyya no ca vata re vattabbe
